name: Missing Teen Hero Last Seen at 2 AM

masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote:
"My kid didn't come home last night—they snuck out around midnight and I just found out they've been doing 'hero stuff' behind my back. Their friend finally told me. I don't know their hero name or what they look like in costume but they said they were going to 'stop something downtown.' It's Christmas morning and they're STILL not back!"

Requirements

  • Track down the missing amateur hero
  • Find out what situation they got themselves into
  • Get them home safely—then have a conversation
